abstract: Profile of David Denson, first baseman with Milwaukee Brewers' minor league affiliate in Helena, Mont, and first player in a Major League Baseball organization to publicly reveal his homosexuality; Denson has declined media requests for interviews, but family members and former teammates and coaches have expressed support for the 20-year-old rookie with intriguing power and a deep passion for the game.
lead_paragraph: For Denson, the burden of trying to keep his identity secret in the largely closeted world of professional sports finally became too much.

headline.main: David Denson, Gay Baseball Prospect, Achieves a Key Victory: Being Himself

snippet: For Denson, the burden of trying to keep his identity secret in the largely closeted world of professional sports finally became too much.
